holidays.title: Birth anniversary of National Artist Atang de la Rama
Cigarettes are Hazardous to Your Health Day
holidays.description: Stay away from cigarettes and learn how they can negatively impact your health.

holidays.title: Healthy Weight, Healthy Look Day
holidays.description: Beef up or cut down on those carbs, and put in some gym time too.

holidays.title: Heritage Treasures Day
holidays.description: Heritage means both the tangible and intangible aspects that make up our cultural identity.

holidays.title: International Parity at Work Day
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about the fight against inequality in the workplace.

holidays.title: International Thank-You Day
holidays.description: What better way to start this new year than with a grateful, thankful heart.

holidays.title: Kosrae Constitution Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready for some FahFah Erah this Kosrae Constitution Day!

holidays.title: Learn Your Name In Morse Code Day
holidays.description: Stand out! Learn how to write your name in Morse code on this historical day.

holidays.title: National Arkansas Day
holidays.description: Parks, museums, rocks, and water… Arkansas deserves a holiday.

holidays.title: National Girl Hug Boy Day
holidays.description: A hug warms our hearts and says what words sometimes cannot express.

holidays.title: National Hot Toddy Day
holidays.description: The warm drink is created with alcohol, along with honey, lemon, water, and a cinnamon stick.

holidays.title: National Human Trafficking Awareness Day
holidays.description: The horrific injustice of human trafficking can affect anyone, and we are here to fight it.

holidays.title: National Joel Day
holidays.description: It’s National Joel Day! If you’re a Joel, we’ll be celebrating you today.

holidays.title: National Milk Day
holidays.description: Holy cow, it's National Milk Day! Celebrate the cornerstone of dairy with these ideas.

holidays.title: National Tara Day
holidays.description: You may just be Tara to some, but you’re a goddess worth celebrating to us.

holidays.title: No Longer New Year's Day
holidays.description: We don’t want to spoil the fun but the party’s over — it’s time to work again.

holidays.title: Paget’s Awareness Day
holidays.description: The most common areas affected by Paget’s are the spine, skull, pelvis, and femur.

holidays.title: Secret Pal Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the people who listen to our secrets and keep their mouths shut.

holidays.title: Step in a Puddle and Splash Your Friends Day
holidays.description: Step in, splash, and have wet fun with friends; the rain brings puddles for a reason.

holidays.title: World Sketchnote Day
holidays.description: Go bold. Go visual! Light up your ideas with more than words and remember it all.

holidays.title: Alexander Hamilton’s Birthday
holidays.description: Alexander Hamilton was a leading proponent of a strong central government for the new U.S.

holidays.title: Alfonso Arau’s Birthday
holidays.description: Alfonso Arau is a powerhouse of talent! Let’s learn more about his creative life.

holidays.title: Emmie Alice’s Birthday
holidays.description: Emmie Alice is a YouTube and Instagram influencer who is passionate about all things fashion!

holidays.title: Jania Bania’s Birthday
holidays.description: She knows how to slay it as an American Instagram influencer and entrepreneur.

holidays.title: Kyle Richards’s Birthday
holidays.description: The multi-talented Beverly Hills socialite is an actress, T.V. personality, philanthropist, and so much more.

holidays.title: Mary J. Blige’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fall in love all over again with the American musician, singer-songwriter, actor, and model!
